activities: Syncreon processes employee personal data including social security numbers, addresses, wages, sex, marital status, etc. that are required to support government reporting mandates. The exact data collected varies from country to country due to variances in local requirements. Employees are informed as part of the hiring process of the data that will be collected and are also informed of syncreon's data privacy policy. Only that data required to meet local requirements is collected and the data is retained in accordance with local laws and securely destroyed when no longer required. Syncreon also processes customer data which includes names and addresses in Europe but none of this data is transferred to the United States.
eucountries: Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
